# Metabolic Alkalosis {#sec-metalk}

## Aetiology

Causes:

* Loss of low SID fluid
	* Urinary
		* Diuretics
		* Corticosteroids
		* Aldosterone excess
			* Cushing
			* Mineralocorticoid
		* Licorice
		* Hypercalcaemia
		* Milk alkali syndrome
		* Mg deficiency
		* Gitelman syndrome
		* Bartter syndrome
	* Enteric
		* Vomiting
			* Pyloric stenosis
			* NG suction
		* Laxative abuse
* Gain of high SIDE fluid
	* Bicarb
	* Sodium citrate
	* High SID RRT
	* Milk alkali

## Pathophysiology

Adverse effects of metabolic acidosis include:

* B
	* Hypoventilation
		* Atelectasis
* C
	* Arrhythmias
	* ↓ Inotropy
* D
	* Vasospasm
	* Seizures
	* Confusion
	* Cramps
* F
	* Electrolyte derangements
* H
	* ↑ Hb oxygen affinity


## Management

* Volume resuscitation with low SID fluid
* Acetazolamide
* IV HCl
* RRT
